column4: Hi all, i have just installed wine fom cvs, but as it is the first time I have used cvs, I am not sure if it is installed. typing wine in a term does nothing. Butthere was no failure in the cvs build?>
did you do a cvs build or did you just get the sources through cvs?
wvdial should be alright too.. or the gnome thing
both I believe! Following this tutorial.  http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=29996
